scenes.text:
Are you interested in sailing, whether as a complete beginner or an experienced sailor? The Cardiff University Sailing Club is one of the largest, friendliest, and most inclusive clubs in the Athletic Union, and we welcome everyone! We aim to run sessions every Wednesday afternoon and weekends, weather permitting.

We offer various sailing opportunities, team racing, yachting and club sailing.

Our main sailing sessions are every Wednesday afternoon, with additional sessions on weekends depending on the weather. We ensure a variety of sessions that cater to different skill levels and interests, from competitive team racing to leisurely sails.

For further information visit our webpage and social media sites.

We have three different levels of membership with differing costs.

Standard Membership: £80.00
Affiliate Membership: £100.00
Erasmus/Half Term Membership: £50.00

These memberships provide access to our sailing sessions, equipment, and social events.

When we are off the water, we host weekly socials every Wednesday with great themes and various fancy-dress nights. These socials are a fantastic way to meet fellow sailors and enjoy a mid-week break. For more information about our socials, contact our Social Secretaries.

For any general enquiries, you can contact our President or Vice President.
